pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genetic Class Association Testing (GenCAT) // Implementation of the genetic class level association testing (GenCAT) method from SNP level association data. Refer to: "Qian, J., Reed, E., Nunez, S., Qu, L., Reilly, M., Foulkes, A. (2015) Testing class-level genetic associations using single-element summary statistics. (Under review).".
